website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Synergy - Power Switch received acclaim from a wide variety of fitness enthusiasts and casual gym-goers. They appreciated its comfortable build, fashionable design, and affordable value. The cushioning gained mixed reviews. On the other hand, people also found faults with its narrow and small fit, lack of support, and inferior materials. The final verdict: the model was deemed lightweight and cozy enough for light exercises; however, those looking for a more heavy-duty and supportive pair may want to skip these shoes.
pros: A majority of the users were impressed by how comfortable the Skechers Synergy - Power Switch was
It had good cushioning, according to many purchasers
Numerous testers admired its stylish aesthetics and color options
Plenty of buyers thought that the shoe gave good value for its price
A few wearers noted that it had a lightweight nature
cons: A handful of reviewers complained that this Skechers workout shoe’s fit was too narrow or small for their liking
Various consumers reported that the footwear felt uncomfortable due to insufficient cushioning
Multiple individuals lambasted the inadequate support offered by the midsole
The trainer is rife with criticisms about its footbed and outsole breaking down after a few months of use
Some detractors complained that the footgear lacked ventilation

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Incredible Comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Why a person would wear any other training shoe is totally beyond me. These things are so comfortable and amazingly light, yet durable. I have three pairs in various colours, and as well as wearing them for leisure and cardio workouts, I wear a pair at work too. Now, I'm on my feet all day but when I get home, my feet are still feeling totally refreshed and ache free. That can't be said for the previous big name branded shoes I used to wear. There's plenty of toe space and the grip on these is phenominal. I'm now a massive fan of these shoes and I'm trying to justify a reason to grab another pair :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mags :)

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers trainers
customer_reviews.text: My second pair..highly recommended, really comfortable, lightweight, and very durable, I don’t ware anything else since I bought the first pair.. love them!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Handley

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: Memory foam in trainers is strange at first but once you get used to it you wonder how you did without it. Ordered a size 12 and a size 13 arrived with is a good thing as they fit like a twelve. Remember that these trainers are not water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, well made and highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable, well made and highly recommended. Shoes appear to let feet breathe where 'trainers' dont. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Philip L. Widdowson

customer_reviews.title: incredibly comfy
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is really lightweight and sturdy so they feel tight and secure around your feet. Plus the memory foam, which is of great quality and always returns to shape, make them the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. Overall quality is fantastic and i can see them lasting a long time. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: michael c

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soft memory foam trainers!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, looking to buy a few more pairs in different colours, as they are comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: V3D Models

customer_reviews.title: Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great to walk in my son loves them and being a size 12 mens shoe size can be difficult to find good trainers
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not the same as the USA version
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because some years ago I bought a similar pair from an outlet in USA and was fantastic. This new pair though is not that flexible and comfortable. I think they make different products for the European market and I have to say that they're not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and were as ordered and fitted perfectly. They are very comfortable and in my opinion are of good quality and very good value.

customer_reviews.title: slightly to big
customer_reviews.text: A six was to small but a 7 slightly to big therefore not as comfortable as they could have been because of the size alone not the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Selivered in quick time. Great comfortable trendy shoe. Light weight but durable. Upper gives good ventilation to feet. Colour contrasting sole with none slip tred.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much loved gift and I am told they fit nicely over bunions. That's a big plus.

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers are great
customer_reviews.text: Love them they are. Comfortable. We're delivered in good time too.

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers
customer_reviews.text: Why i never bought any before I'll never know but I'll tell u this...... I'll be buying loads more pairs believe me lol these trainers hit 5 star with everything. The memory foam inside them is top notch. Perfect in every respect.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exceedingly comfortable. The fit is very good and they are very light on your feet.

customer_reviews.title: Good teainers
customer_reviews.text: Not the most fashionable trainer, but really comfy and hard-wearing. Fit my son's size 13s just right

customer_reviews.text: second pair, they must be good. nice fit light,and comfy.

customer_reviews.title: He found them very comfortable. I am happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my husband. He found them very comfortable. I am happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.text: loved the shoes, so comfy,however i got a uk size 9 but could have got away with a 8 or 8.5.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Little slow at get to me . Worth the wait .

customer_reviews.title: The best shoes on the market
customer_reviews.text: Have a pair of yellow and these are equally good -best equal most comfortable shoes I have ever had the joy to wear!

customer_reviews.title: best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: proved to be a perfect fit and so light and comfortable worn them for a few days now and I'm still more than pleased with fit and comfort

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size delivered so too small. This style is usually true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Body

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable fit and nice and light weight. Worth paying that little bit extra for good quality footwear. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: D. Hull

customer_reviews.title: satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5stars because I was so happy with my new Sketchers ,they fit as snug as a bug in a rug so comfortable best fit I have ever had. Good service and for quality best price ever. Jim Nicol
customer_reviews.author: JIM NICOL

customer_reviews.title: Great for kicks!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. They cover all my feets and keep them warm. With the memory foam it's bouncy, and feels like i'm walking on the moon. After some time the moon walking fades and they're just normal shoes. If like me your going to wear these late at night when out looking for small mammals to kick, i recommend taping a torch to each shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Warning

product_meta.title: Skechers Synergy Power Switch, Men's Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: Skechers Synergy Powerswitch Mens Trainers. Mens/gents extra lightweight skech-knit mesh fabric and synthetic upper training shoes/trainers with seamless upper super comfy memory foam insock. This style has a shock absorbing flexsole midsole for lightness, lace up front and durable stabilising panels at the sides and toe.. Charcoal/Navy.
feature_bullets: Other: Skechers Synergy – Power Shield mens trainers
